alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 03 at 3:50AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches. Very strong northeast to north winds will develop this afternoon and this evening. This will result in very significant blowing and drifting of snow. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range. * WHEN...Now until to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become impossible, especially tonight into Tuesday. Extended road closures are likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions at times with white- out conditions occurring across southeast Fremont County.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
